con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="accountService" targetNamespace="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:tns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:ns2="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http" xmlns:ns1="http://www.example.org/AccountService/"> <wsdl:import location="http://localhost:8080/services/accountService?wsdl=AccountService.wsdl" namespace="http://www.example.org/AccountService/"></wsdl:import> <wsdl:binding name="accountServiceSoapBinding" type="ns1:AccountService"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="withdraw"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.example.org/AccountService/withdraw" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="withdraw"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="withdrawResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="getBalance"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.example.org/AccountService/getBalance" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="getBalance"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="getBalanceResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="transfer"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.example.org/AccountService/transfer" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="transfer"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="transferResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="deposit"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.example.org/AccountService/deposit" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="deposit"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="depositResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="accountService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:accountServiceSoapBinding" name="$Proxy89Port"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/services/accountService"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<wsdl:definitions name="AccountService" targetNamespace="http://www.example.org/AccountService/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:ns1="http://www.example.org/AccountService/"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://www.example.org/AccountService/" version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:element name="deposit"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="accountNo" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="amount" type="xs:double"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="depositResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="status" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="message" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="getBalance"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="accountNo" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="getBalanceResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="status" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="message" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="amount" type="xs:double"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="transfer"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="sourceAccountNo" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="destAccountNo" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="amount" type="xs:double"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="transferResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="status" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="message" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="withdraw"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="accountNo" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="amount" type="xs:double"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="withdrawResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="status" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="message" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="withdraw"> <wsdl:part element="ns1:withdraw" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="withdrawResponse"> <wsdl:part element="ns1:withdrawResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getBalanceResponse"> <wsdl:part element="ns1:getBalanceResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="transferResponse"> <wsdl:part element="ns1:transferResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="deposit"> <wsdl:part element="ns1:deposit" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getBalance"> <wsdl:part element="ns1:getBalance" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="transfer"> <wsdl:part element="ns1:transfer" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="depositResponse"> <wsdl:part element="ns1:depositResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="AccountService"> <wsdl:operation name="withdraw"> <wsdl:input message="ns1:withdraw" name="withdraw"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="ns1:withdrawResponse" name="withdrawResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="getBalance"> <wsdl:input message="ns1:getBalance" name="getBalance"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="ns1:getBalanceResponse" name="getBalanceResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="transfer"> <wsdl:input message="ns1:transfer" name="transfer"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="ns1:transferResponse" name="transferResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="deposit"> <wsdl:input message="ns1:deposit" name="deposit"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="ns1:depositResponse" name="depositResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> </wsdl:definitions>

con:testSuite.name: TS_02 for negative test cases = LOCAL SERVICES

con:testCase.name: TC_05 Check Balance With Invalid Account

con:assertion.name: Validating Soap Response to be a Valid SOAP response --<SOAP RESPONSE>
Validating the status Response contains 103 as StatusCode for Invalid Account ACC-10009 --<XPATH>
Checking Balance/Validating Balance = 0.0 for an Invalid Account ACC-10009 --<XPATH>
Validating the status Response contains "Account ACC-10009 doesn't exist" as Message for Invalid Account ACC-10009 --<XPATH>

con:testCase.name: TC_06 Check Deposit With Invalid Account

con:assertion.name: Validating Soap Response to be a Valid SOAP response --<SOAP RESPONSE>
Validating the status Response contains 100 as StatusCode for Invalid Account ACC-10009 --<XPATH>
Validating the status Response contains "Account ACC-10009 doesn't exist" as Message for Invalid Account ACC-10009 --<XPATH>
